item.name: Authentication

request.description:
# register

field :

name with validation required, string, min 3, max 100,

email with validation required, email, unique

password with validation required, string, min 8, regex:a-z, A-Z, 0-9, !@#$%^&\* confirm

registration will create default user role

response.name: Register failed

request.description:
# login

field :

email with validation required, email,

password with validation required,

if login success will returned jwt

Tokens in the environment do not need to be filled in manually because when the login is successful, they will be filled in automatically with this script:

const response = pm.response.json();  
environmentpm.environment.set("AUTH_TOKEN", response.token);

# logout

for request logout just required token

response.name: Logout failed if token expired or destroyed

item.description:
Endpoint Authentication provide 3 request

- Register
    
- Login
    
- Logout

item.name: Books

query.description: search by, book_name, users.name, description. categories.category_name

request.description:
# find all books

if not with request params find all book will returned all data book order by created_at asc

if with request params find all books will returned data book as requested paginate 10

q as query search with specifiet search by book_name, users.name, description, categories.category_name paginate 10

order-by with specifiet only input asc or desc

response.name: Find All Books success

query.description: search by, book_name, users.name, description. categories.category_name

response.name: Find All Books success with query search categories.category_name = ilmiah

query.description: search by, book_name, users.name, description. categories.category_name

response.name: Find All Books success with request params order by desc

query.description: search by, book_name, users.name, description. categories.category_name

response.name: Find All Books failed with token expired or not input token

query.description: search by, book_name, users.name, description. categories.category_name

request.description:
# find detail book

request find detail book by id book

response.name: Find Detail Book success
Find Detail Book failed id book not found

formdata.value: Ini adalah buku biografi tentang perjalanan hidup saya

request.description:
# add book

field :

book_name with validation required, string, min 3, max 100, unique,

image wirh validation required, mimes:jpg, jpeg, png, svg max size 2048

book_file with validation required, mimes:pdf,docx,pptx,txt,

description with validation required,

category_id required, integer

response.name: Add Book success

formdata.value: Ini adalah buku biografi tentang perjalanan hidup saya

response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Add book successfully",
    "statusCode": 201,
    "data": {
        "book_name": "Jurnal Penelitian Kota Pekalongan part 2",

        "description": "Ini adalah buku biografi tentang perjalanan hidup saya",
        "category_id": "95224",
        "user_id": 69383,
        "id": 63122,
        "updated_at": "2024-12-08T14:35:47.000000Z",
        "created_at": "2024-12-08T14:35:47.000000Z"
    }
}

request.description:
# edit book

field :

book_name with validation required, string, min 3, max 100, unique,

image wirh validation required, mimes:jpg, jpeg, png, svg max size 2048

book_file with validation required, mimes:pdf,docx,pptx,txt,

description with validation required,

category_id required, integer

request params id required

response.name: Edit Book failed id book not found

request.description:
# delete book

request delet book only input id book

response.name: Delete Book failed id book not found

item.description:
Endpoint Books provide 5 request

- find all books
    
- fin detail book
    
- add book
    
- edit book
    
- delete book

item.name: Categories

request.description:
# find all categories

if not with request params find all categories will returned all data categoyr order by created_at asc

if with request params find all categories will returned data category as requested paginate 10

q as query search with specifiet search by category_name paginate 10

order-by with specifiet only input asc or desc

response.name: Find all categories success

request.description:
# find detail category

request find detail category only input id category

response.name: Find Detail Category failed id not found

request.description:
# add category

field :

category_name with validation required, string, min 3 max 100, unique

can add category only role admin

response.name: Add Category failed category_name alredy
Add Category failed add role user

request.description:
# edit category

field :

category_name with validation required, string min 3 max 100, unique

request params id

can edit category only role admin

response.name: Edit Category failed id not found

request.description:
# delete category

request delete category only input request params id category

can delete category only role admin

response.name: Delete Category failed id not found

item.description:
Endpoint Categories provide 5 request

- find all categories
    
- find detail category
    
- add category
    
- edit category
    
- delete category

item.name: Users

request.description:
# find all users

request find all users only role admin can access

query params :

q as query search, search by name, email, role

order-by query order by created_at asc or desc

}

request.description:

field :

name with validate required, string, min 3 max 100,

email with validate required, email, unique,

password with validate required, string, min 8, confirmed, regex:a-z, A-Z, 0-9, !@#$%^&\*

password_confirmation with validate required,

role : required only input user or admin

only admin can access this request
